member.name: M:ToDoListAPI.Controllers.ToDoListController.List
member.summary: Get list of all TODO items If Empty, save first and then call List

member.name: M:ToDoListAPI.Controllers.ToDoListController.SaveTask(Common.ToDoList)
member.returns: true if added/updated successfully, false if not saved

member.name: M:ToDoListAPI.Controllers.ToDoListController.RemoveTask(System.Int32)
member.summary: Remove item with given task id
member.param: Id of the task to be removed
member.returns: true if removed successfully, false if the item doesn't exist
